name: Labyrinthian (itch) (afells, jmgktm)
description:
This is Labyrinthian an experimental project for game 440.

Controls: Use the WASD and arrow keys in order to move and use the spacebar to jump.

Directions on how to play the Game.:

In this game, we have two groups and one player 1. The player going through a dark environment.1 group will be tasked with helping the player navigate through the environment. 1 group will be trying to spread misinformation in order to slow the player down as much as possible. Both groups will be armed with a map of the environment.

Rules :

Rule1: Both groups are not allowed to tell people which group you are in 

Rule 2: Both groups are not allowed to tell people which group they are in

Rule 3 Both groups are not allowed to tell the player who they are the player must rely on voices alone

 link to the map file:https://docs.google.com/document/d/122bJZy-o5eHGPjI9PdRVC40PTmezLeNc88JU_kFR4uY/...
